titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to recognize the time required to save funds for the college education of adopted children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to set forth a formula to adjust the amount of required family contribution for parents of dependent children in cases where such children are adopted.
